name: Crepes
steps: Mix all ingredients in a blender. Heat round skillet to medium heat and grease with partially unwrapped butter or
butter spray. Pour a small amount into pan and move it around from side to side until the bottom of the pan is
covered. Cook for about one minute then flip it over, should be lightly done on both sides.
Top with Fresh fruit and whipping cream or whatever you may like. Also good with veggies, cheese and meat.
